DOC.brief_summary: In study , aim examine effect whey protein supplementation give night sleep Fat Free Mass ( FFM ) preservation 4 wk period Very Low Caloric Diet ( VLCD ) . Half participant underwent 4 week VLCD walk program , half underwent 4 week VLCD , walk program additional protein supplement night sleep .
DOC.brief_title: Preservation Fat Free Mass During Weight Loss
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( kg/m^2 ) > 28 Age 18 55 year Participation regular resistance , aerobic anaerobic training ( > 1 h/wk within last 3 month intervention start ) Diabetes Physical disability would hinder completion walk program .
